name: Prawn Noodle Soup Stock
recipeIngredient: 50 g fresh root ginger (peeled and sliced),
700 g pork and chicken bones (or pork ribs and chicken wings),
recipeInstructions: 1. Put all the stock ingredients into a deep pan along with the prawn shells.
2. Pour in 2 l of water and bring to the boil.
3. Reduce the heat and simmer gently, uncovered, for about 2 hours, until the stock has reduced by half.
4. Strain the stock into a fresh pan and put on a low heat to keep warm.
5. Season the stock with salt and pepper.
